Title: Gawr Gura
GameText: Power - Atlantean Shark: Gura deals 1 target 2 cold damage. Draw 1 card.

- 1 Hero may play 1 One-Shot card.
- Destroy 1 Environment card.
- 1 Hero takes their DRAW PHASE.

Title: Gawr Gura
GameText: Power - Cat Shark: Play or salvage 1 One-Shot card.

Title: A
GameText:
You and 1 ally Hero each draw 1 card.
Collect 1 Ongoing card.
Play 1 card.

Title: Apex Predator
GameText:
After Gura destroys a traget, you may use a power.
POWER: Gura regains 2 HP.
Quote: "Oh? Hehehehe... Oh, little ebi? What are you doing down there?"

Title: Bathtub Pizza
GameText:
Discard 1 card.
Either draw 1 card or salvage 1 card.
Gura regains 3 HP.
Quote: "Anyways, I was eating my pizza in the bath and I dropped it. It made a sound, it went ker-sploosh! ... And then I picked it up and I ate it."

Title: Bloop
GameText:
You may redirect damage dealt to Gura to this card.
When this card is destroyed, Gura regains 2 HP and you may play 1 card.
Quote: "That is correct! Bloop is emergency rations."

Title: Hoocha!!
GameText: REACTION: Gura deals the attacker 2 cold damage.
Quote: "Sometimes, life hits you with a hoocha! You know what you do in this predicament? When life hoocha's you? You go againnn!"

Title: Hydrodynamic
GameText:
After an Environment target is played, you may play 1 card.
After a non-target Environment card is played, you may draw 1 card.
Quote: "There's a reason I'm not boing boing, alright? It comes down to science. I am hydrodynamic!"
Attribution: -- Gura, gura is a battle master, 2020/09/23

Title: Jump Scare
GameText:
The lowest HP Villain target deals Gura 2 psychic damage.
Gura deals each non-Hero target 2 irreducible sonic damage.
Quote: "It's a-gyaaaaa!!! AAAAH! ... I just wanna disappearrrr..."

Title: Memories of Atlantis
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
Summon Poseidon's Trident.
You may use 1 power.
Quote: "Ever hear of Atlantis? I'm from Atlantis." "Shut UP, Gura..."

Title: Poseidon's Trident
GameText:
+1 damage dealt by Gura
POWER: Gura deals 1 target 2 melee damage or 2 cold damage.
Quote: "If I see one person say cringe in this chat, I'm throwing my trident at the wall. That thing hasn't seen action in a millennia."

Title: Reflect
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
Discard any number of cards that share a name with a card in your play area.
For each card discarded this way, Gura deals 1 target 3 infernal damage.
Quote: Return to what you know    It ain't much, I know     Heh, it shows

Title: Rhythm Master
GameText:
After you play a One-Shot card for the first time each turn, you may play 1 card.
DRAW PHASE
You may draw an additional card this phase.
Quote: "Full combo! Now that's an apex predator!"

Title: Shaaaaaaark!
GameText:
Either destroy 1 Ongoing card or Gura deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
Draw 1 card.

Title: Shark Hood
GameText: REACTION: -2 to the damage that would be dealt. If Gura takes no damage this way, draw 1 card.
Quote: "When was the last time you washed your      hoodie, gura? when was the last time?"    "Shut up Watson!"
Attribution: -- ame and gura, april fools collab, 2021/04/01

Title: Shark Instinct
GameText:
Gura deals 1 target 4 melee damage.
If that target is destroyed, Gura regains 2 HP.
Quote: "Did you know? Tiger sharks eat everything. And I resonate with this."

Title: Ukelele
GameText: POWER: Reveal the top card of your deck. Play it or draw it.
Quote: "da da dada da daaaaa! ohhh, the memowies!"
